attributes.action: To make another guitar hero for the next gen consoles.
attributes.additional_details: The game was and is still popular in previous consoles and a lot of people miss the game. The previous guitar hero games are not backwards compatible on the new consoles so cannot play them.
attributes.background: To make Activision make guitar hero for the next gen consoles.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

We also can't accept petitions which call for actions with regard to named individuals, organisations or businesses.
